text: Krzysztof Pius Zanussi, (born 17 June 1939) is a Polish producer and movie director.Krzysztof Zanussi Faculty Website at the European Graduate School. Includes biography and filmography. He made over 100 Polish-language movies. His career has lasted for nearly 50 years. Zanussi was born in Warsaw, Poland. He studied at the University of Warsaw. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Polish movie directors Category:Polish movie producers Category:Polish screenwriters Category:People from Warsaw
title: Krzysztof Zanussi
